dc:description: Fragment of brown/black woven goat hair fabric with very deteriorated bands of red and yellow weft which use paired warps.  There is a single rib selvedge along one edge and the plain weave brown/black section has a large area of darning repair stitches.  There are two different linen sewing yarns along the selvedge edge.
